articles.description: The series debuted on Christmas Day and has remained in the top spot on Netflix's most-watched list ever since, proving to be a mammoth success.
articles.content:
Netflix has teased 'exciting news' about Bridgerton after the show was tipped to run for eight seasons.

articles.content:
People have reacted with surprise to the news that US president Donald Trump has issued a presidential pardon to rapper Lil Wayne.
